    Welcome to Aditya Estates

    [vc_column_text]

    Aditya Estates, based in Noida Sector 18 in the Delhi NCR region, is the most professional real estate agency specializing in fresh bookings, resale, and rentals of residential, commercial, and industrial properties.

    With their extensive expertise and experience in the real estate market, Aditya Estates caters to clients’ needs in Noida, Greater Noida, Yamuna Expressway, Faridabad, Ghaziabad, and Gurugram areas.

    As a professionally managed organization, Aditya Estates is known for providing Comprehensive Solutions for real estate transactions. We have a wide range of properties in our portfolio, representing major real estate developers and builders.
    Whether it’s a new booking, resale, or rental property, Aditya Estates offers personalized services to clients, helping them find the perfect property that meets their requirements.

    [/vc_column_text]Read More..[vc_empty_space height=”20px”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1515686965699{padding-right: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1511348683940{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;}”][vc_column_inner css=”.vc_custom_1515686937192{padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”7497″ alignment=”center”][vc_custom_heading text=”Services We Offer” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center|color:%23dd3333″][vc_column_text]

    Aditya Estates is a leading real estate agency in North India, specializing in the sale, purchase, and renting of properties in and around the Delhi NCR region, including Noida, Greater Noida, Yamuna Expressway, Ghaziabad, Gurugram, Delhi, and Faridabad.

    [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”box1″ width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”7629″ img_size=”400*300″ alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_rounded”]

    Aditya Estates is an expert in both fresh bookings and resales of properties from major real estate developers and builders. The firm provides a wide range of services related to the resale of properties,

    Aditya Estates not only specializes in the sale and purchase of properties, but it also provides a variety of services related to properties. These services include legal assistance for any property disputes,

    Read more..

    [/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_section][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1682538342488{background-image: url(https://hindi-gyan.com/aditya/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/bg.png?id=7488) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”100px”][vc_single_image image=”7497″ alignment=”center”][vc_custom_heading text=”Why Choose us” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center|color:%23dd3333″][vc_column_text]

    Aditya Estates is a full-service real estate firm that offers an extensive range of real estate services to both investors and end users seeking properties for self-use. Our dedicated staff is highly capable of providing exceptional services to our clients, catering to their specific needs in residential, commercial, and industrial properties. Whether you are looking to invest or find a property for personal use, we ensure that our team delivers the best possible solutions to meet your requirements.

    [/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

    Professionalism

    Professional real estate agents possess market knowledge, negotiation skills, and a commitment to serving their clients' best interests. They prioritize clear communication, prompt responses, and diligent representation to ensure a smooth and successful transaction.

    Honesty

    Honesty in real estate is crucial for maintaining trust and integrity. It entails providing accurate information, disclosing material facts, and acting in the best interests of clients. Honest real estate professionals prioritize transparency and ethical behaviour to foster long-term relationships and successful transactions.

    [/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

    Expertise

    Expertise in real estate is the specialized knowledge and skills possessed by professionals. It includes market analysis, property valuation, negotiation, and legal understanding, enabling experts to provide informed guidance and achieve optimal outcomes for clients.

    Diversity

    Diversity is required in real estate to foster fairness, equal opportunities, and inclusive representation. It enriches the industry by bringing in varied perspectives, experiences, and ideas, resulting in better decision-making and the ability to meet the diverse needs of clients and communities.

    [/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

    Confidentiality

    Confidentiality in real estate refers to the ethical obligation of professionals to protect the sensitive information of their clients. It involves maintaining privacy regarding financial details, personal circumstances, and any other confidential information shared during transactions, ensuring trust and discretion in the real estate process.

    Reliability

    Reliability is important in real estate as it builds trust and confidence among clients. Being dependable and consistent in delivering on promises ensures smooth transactions, timely communication, and the ability to meet client expectations, establishing a strong reputation in the industry.

    [/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”100px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1682709353543{padding-top: 115px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;background-color: #f5f5f5 !important;background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;}” el_class=”background-right”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1516029195606{padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner css=”.vc_custom_1516029204083{padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”]

    Happy Customers

    We keep our clients at the core of our business. Here are just a few reviews of what our valued customers have to say about our valuable services and business ethics.

    I had booked a flat through Aditya Estates. When builder started to harass this firm stood with me and with their help we could not only get timely possession but also interest on delayed possession. A lot of thanks.

    SAKSHI

    Best real estate professional in Noida. We bought a four bedroom flat through them and I thank Aditya Estates for their behaviour. Highly recommended.

    Ananya Baranwal

    Best professional real estates consultants. Not only we could sell our property at a very reasonable rates, but we also bought a flat at a very attractive rates through them.

    Rajneesh Shakya

    May god bless you, Thanks to help me. Good time good investment. My budget was very low you suggest me the very beautiful house in a very good location in noida. My family is very happy in our own house. Thank you sir.

    SHIKHAR

    Certainly, the best place for all type of property transactions in Delhi NCR, especially in Noida and Greater Noida. Impressed with their professionalism and honesty.

    Haripriya
